no unalterable rules exist in landscape architecture because each plot of ground offers unique problems caused by variation in contour , climate , and surrounding areas .在景观设计中不存在教条的规矩，由于地形，气候以及周边环境的差异，所以每一块场地都有着其唯一的独特的解决方案。
Physical teaching should play an unalterable role in psychological health education to modern college students ., 体育教学在当代大学生心理健康教育中发挥着不可替代的特殊作用.
